name: The Westlake Hanoi House
address: 70 Tu Hoa Cong Chua Street, Tay Ho District, Tay Ho District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Situated 5 km from Hanoi, The Westlake Hanoi House boasts a sun terrace and views of the lake. Yên Bài is 41 km from the property. Free WiFi is featured .

The pet-friendly accommodation is air conditioned and is fitted with a seating and dining area. Some units include a terrace and/or balcony. There is also a kitchen, equipped with an oven, microwave and fridge. A stovetop and kettle are also provided.

Car hire is available at the property and the area is popular for cycling. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 18 km from The Westlake Hanoi House.
